Privacy Policy – NotesMarket

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use NotesMarket.

  1. Information We Collect: We may collect basic information like your name and email (if you sign up for newsletters or contact us). We also collect non-personal data like browser type, device type, and pages visited to improve user experience.
  2. How We Use Your Information: To respond to your queries or feedback. To improve our website and content. To send occasional updates or educational resources (if you subscribe).
  3. Cookies: We use cookies to enhance user experience and gather analytics. You can disable cookies in your browser settings if you prefer.
  4. Sharing Information: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties, except as required by law.
  5. External Links: Our website may contain links to other educational resources. We are not responsible for their privacy practices.
  6. Data Security: We use reasonable measures to protect your data, but no method is 100% secure.
  7. Children’s Privacy: NotesMarket is intended for students of all ages. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without parental consent.
  8. Changes to This Policy: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Please review it periodically.
